item.title: 5 Soft Skills tips for Software Developers
item.description: Image Credits - Priscilla Du Preez on Unsplash As the Software Engineer role grows in popularity and everyone gets themselves into technical bootcamps, itâ€™s also common to see companies saying that Soft Skills are also an important factor when considering a candidate for a position. But what are those, and why do people seem to have a hard time giving concrete examples? What are Soft Skills? According to the Collins English Dictionary, the term is defined as:
